variant.p: Paragraph 8 requires entities to disclose financial assets and financial liabilities by the measurement categories in IFRS 9 Financial Instruments. The Board concluded that disclosures for each measurement category would assist users in understanding the extent to which accounting policies affect the amounts at which financial assets and financial liabilities are recognised.
